data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Mengqing, Chen, Hongyin, Yang, Ding (2014): Review of the genus Chrysotimus Loew from Tibet (Diptera, Dolichopodidae). ZooKeys 424: 117-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.424.7562, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.424.7562
